solution_line_template: With her regular shoes, it should take {miles_to_run}*{normal_mile_time}=<<{miles_to_run}*{normal_mile_time}={time_with_normal_shoes}>>{time_with_normal_shoes} minutes to run five miles
If she wore her new shoes it would take {new_shoes_mile_time}*{miles_to_run}=<<{new_shoes_mile_time}*{miles_to_run}={time_with_new_shoes}>>{time_with_new_shoes} minutes to run five miles
